lead_paragraph: UNIONDALE, N.Y., Nov. 4 (AP) — Marian Hossa had a goal and an assist, and Johan Hedberg made 23 saves to win his second consecutive start for the Atlanta Thrashers in a 4-1 victory Saturday night against the Islanders.
